course_description: Learning to read literature from a rheoretical viewpoint, its formal properties, distinctive features, origins, purposes, and capacities for representing the world; representative critics and schools from contemporary and earlier periods. *Note: This course is non-repeatable.
sections: Class Nbr: 3915, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 1-2:15p, Instructor: E. Marder, Status: Open
